name: Caldwell - Muricas - Magnum
additionalNotes: The Caldwell Muricas is one of three cigars in the Selección Junior Varsity line. The Varsity Line is a more budget friendly line from Caldwell. All the cigars in the Selección Junior Varsity line have a theme based around Spain. The Muricas, which is named for a city in Southeastern Spain, is a Mexican San Andres Maduro offering.
